title: Bug 2694 - Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)
description: Bug 2694 - Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE) press Add for the associated editors. a. Multiple selection could be enabled. c. The default entry in the associated editors list could be marked (default) (see perspectives) NOTES: KLM (10/10/2001 1:54:57 PM) Also: f. Need a width hint for the dialog. g. Why does the File editors Pref page grow in height when it is selected, but no other pages do the same? I currently have fixes for a, c, f. Need to release. KLM (10/10/2001 5:58:58 PM) released fixes for a, c, f, g
OB: The 'Add' feature adds a hidden entry. The associated editors list shows entries that are already existing. The preference page for 'File Editors' grows in height when selected, unlike other pages.
EB: 'Add' should not add a hidden entry. Entries already existing in the associated editors should not be available for selection.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Go to the preference page and navigate to Workbench > File Editors. 2. Without selecting anything from the 'Internal Editors' section, switch to the 'External Editors' section and select an entry. 3. Switch back to the 'Internal Editors' section and press OK. This adds the selected external editor.
